info.title: Video Game Information
info.description: This api will search any game on ign, gamespot, and metacritic and will give you the reviews of the critic and the users. It can also give you information about the game such as publisher, developer, genre, summary, release date, and more.

get.description: This if for getting information about a specific game

parameters.name: console
parameters.description: the platform or console the game is played on. for example xbox 360, playstation 3, wii u, ...

parameters.name: game_name
parameters.description: This is the name of the game that you want information of

get.description: This is for searching a game. Search for a game name and it will return the list of possible games that have similar names

parameters.name: console

parameters.name: game_name
